variant.question: During preparation for take-off the flight crew received an ACARS load sheet message with the note "PRELIM" on the header. Five minutes later, the ground staff provides a paper copy of the load sheet with the note "FINAL" on the header. The Commander realizes that there are differences between the masses on the paper copy and the ACARS message. Which statement below is correct?

options.text: The Commander shall use the paper copy because it is the final version of the load sheet.
The Commander shall ignore all previous load sheet documents and prepare a new one manually.
The Commander shall call ground staff and ask for clarification.
The Commander shall use the ACARS load sheet, because that is more accurate than the paper copy of the load sheet.
